Dapper is a cncf project it is short for the distributed application runtime and
the way uh it works with radius is that it creates an abstraction between the
concrete state store or messaging implementation and um the software so if
you have software that wants to use storage or you have software that wants to use pops up messaging in the dev
environment uh you wanted to use containerized uh resources in a production environment you probably
want to use path services in the cloud and Dapper is really good in abstracting
the specific details away so it offers a generic API for state store for
messaging and you just say hey Dapper send a message for me and the concrete
implementation will be targeted by a specific deer component so it knows how
to talk to Red is it knows how to talk to as service bus but the software doesn't need to know about that
